resources.string: Add Membership to your location to add more than 4 devices. Plus get a 30-day video timeline, home deductible reimbursement and more.

Canary can automatically switch between Away and Home modes as people come and go from this location. Auto-mode switching improves when Wi-Fi is enabled. When off, location members must manually switch between modes.
When all members are away Canary monitors for activity and sends notifications.
The battery is charging. A full charge may take up to 12 hours.
Receive a notification when Canary Flex is fully charged.
Good to go. Canary Flex is fully charged.
Time to recharge. Plug in your Canary Flex as soon as you can.
No need to recharge yet. Theres plenty of battery power remaining.
The battery is getting low. Consider charging soon.
Try moving Canary Flex out of direct sunlight or reconnecting the charging cable.
When your device reconnects to the internet the battery level will be displayed here.
You can adjust how much motion Canary Flex records to prolong its battery life per charge.
On normal battery, Canary Flex records motion within a 20\' range.
On battery saver, Canary Flex reduces its range to ignore smaller and farther away motion to prolong battery life.
Bookmark important events or download them to your mobile device.
Canary could not connect to WiFi because the password is incorrect.
Canary could not connect to WiFi because the network was not found.
Timeout has occurred while trying to connect to a WiFi network.
Canary could not connect to WiFi, please try again. If the problem continues, contact customer support.

By sharing data from your Canary with your insurance provider (such as sensor readings and alert frequency), you can speed up analysis and unlock deeper discounts in the future. Video and audio will never be shared and you can opt out at any time.
Keep Canary\'s air quality sensor calibrated by ventilating your home with outside air. Make a habit of opening windows or doors to let fresh air in and to help Canary stay as accurate as possible.
Canary cannot detect your audio cable.
Your Canary All-in-One is connected to the internet. Unplug both ends of the yellow cable to complete setup.

Canary uses your location to automatically switch modes when you come and go, and to determine your address and local emergency phone numbers.

Your geofence is a perimeter around your location that is used to know when location members are home or away. It controls things like auto-mode switching.
Data saver is turned on. For accurate auto-mode switching, allow unrestricted access for Canary.

If outdoors, protect your device from direct sunlight by placing it under a overhang or in a shady area.
When plugged in and monitoring for activity a white light will appear at the bottom of your devices. Its off when set to private. The Canary Flex does not display a light on battery power.
Our incident support team will assist you following a security incident.
Canary detects overall changes in air quality caused by pollutants including:
Canary assesses your home\'s air quality the amount of contaminants in the air and shows you what\'s inside and outside the normal range for your specific environment.

Canary measures your home\'s humidity, which is an indication of how much water vapor is in the air. Humidity goes hand in hand with temperature, and can affect a number of health and structural factors in your house or apartment.

Canary tracks your home\'s climate and shows you real-time temperature readings along with recent heat spikes or drops. These measurements can help you monitor your comfort, your utilities bill, and your safety.
Call (800) 6993739, dial \"2\" for Customer Service, and request the self-monitored "Theft Protection Discount".
No documentation of installation is required. Discount and discount level availability varies by state. Discount currently not offered for Flex devices.
Contact your agent and request the \"Local Burglar Alarm\" level discount under the State Farm Home Alert Protection Discount.

Masks are a great way to reduce unwanted notifications. Canary will ignore motion inside a mask.

Tap the menu to add another Canary, adjust settings, or get help. That\'s all! If you ever want to restart the tutorial, find it in Get Help.
Tap down here to change between away, home, or night mode.
Here you control auto-mode switching, which automatically changes the mode when you\'re home to disarmed or privacy.

Add four Canary devices to your location. That\'s one by the front door and others in the living room, kids room, or anywhere else.
Your profile is where you can add a photo, change personal details, or set preferences, like degree type.

Securely plug an Ethernet cable into the back of your Canary. Connect the other end to your router.
Plug the yellow audio cable into the back of your device. Connect the other end into your phones audio jack.
Use wire-free at any time. You can plug your device into a weatherproof, covered outlet if you see a green dot on the bottom of the power adapter.
Position your device on a flat surface with a clear field of view, 3 to 5 feet off the ground.

power adapter from your Canary
and then plug it back in. Canary
flashes yellow when it is ready.

This will remove the device from this location and account and reset its settings. Location members will not be able to access past activity.
This will remove the device from this location and account and reset its settings. Past activity from this device will remain on your Timeline.

to the past 24 hours of activity
and storage of five saved events
on the Canary Cloud.

call center options, Canary offers
contract-free monthly service plans
for your home or apartment.
